                                                                                
 Usage: dspygen [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...                                     
                                                                                
╭─ Options ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ --install-completion          Install completion for the current shell.      │
│ --show-completion             Show completion for the current shell, to copy │
│                               it or customize the installation.              │
│ --help                        Show this message and exit.                    │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
╭─ Commands ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╮
│ assert     Generate assertions for dspy.                                     │
│ command    Generate new sub commands or add to existing ones.                │
│ help       Help chatbot and realtime help file update.                       │
│ init       Initialize the DSPygen project.                                   │
│ lm         Generate Language Models                                          │
│ module     Generate DSPy Modules or call exist ones.                         │
│ sig        Generate dspy.Signatures                                          │
│ tutor      Guide you through developing a project with DSPyGen.              │
╰──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────╯
